original_text: I will pay my vows unto the Lord now in the presence of all his people.
korean_text: 여호와의 모든 백성 앞에서 나는 나의 서원을 여호와께 갚으리로다

sentences.original_text: I will pay my vows unto the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 주님께 나의 서원을 갚을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: now in the presence of all his people
